explanation: [0-0] The screen is divided into three parts. The upper and lower parts are black screens. In the middle part, there is a tank driving simulator in a room. The simulator is connected to a display screen, which shows the tank firing. There is a black table in the room with a large launcher in the middle. The camera is facing the display. There are many wires and cables scattered on top, connecting various devices, and a hand is holding a steering wheel in front of the table.

[0-3] In the middle part of the screen, the driver of the tank simulator is operating the device, and the tank on the screen moves with his operation. Then the picture moves to the left, and you can see other people standing in the room. The white words "TANK IN FANTASY" appear at the top of the screen.
